1499432624938438656.text: This is a sad reality compared to how this country treated its veterans after World War II, which included my father, who served as a U.S. Navy quartermaster in the Pacific. For him, & millions of others, the G.I. Bill cared for the wounded and set service members up for success.

1499432623113969673.text: Many of our veterans who were exposed to toxic substances during active service are now experiencing horrific health impacts. To add insult to injury, the disability benefit claims process is cumbersome and places the burden to prove toxic exposure on veterans themselves.

1499432620765200389.text: 🧵Veterans across the country, including the over 42,000 in my district, will receive expanded access to care and benefits through the Honoring our PACT Act. Today, I was proud to cast my vote to help get our #veterans the help they deserve. https://t.co/lCma5SmIUV

1461708636229619715.text: Not only does this legislation help solve the problems Marylanders face today, but it also secures a brighter future for our children and grandchildren. That’s what we’re fighting for. That’s what #BuildBackBetter is all about. It's a #BFD.

1461708634753323008.text: #BuildBackBetter will also expand rental assistance for Marylanders and improve public housing. It'll help create economic opportunity for Marylanders struggling to make ends meet. That's a #BFD.

1461708633251713025.text: We will help provide affordable child care for nearly 400,000 of Maryland’s children. This expansion ensures that parents don’t have to choose between building their careers and taking care of their kids. This will help close the gender gap in our workforce. That's a #BFD.

1461708631766974470.text: We're going to hold drug companies accountable. Long gone are the days of drug companies unfairly increasing their prices beyond inflation. With #BuildBackBetter, life-saving medications will be within reach of those who need them. That's a #BFD.

1461708630613446656.text: Health care is a right, not a privilege. Plain and simple. That’s why we’re expanding Medicare and Medicaid so over 30,000 uninsured Marylanders will get coverage, and even more folks will save hundreds of dollars per year on their health care costs. That's a #BFD.

1461708629208453130.text: For the first time EVER, folks can depend on a universal, paid family and medical leave program. I don't have to tell you that this is long overdue. It's life-changing support for families caring for loved ones, or those struggling with #MentalHealth or #addiction. That's a #BFD.

1461708627924996096.text: This is the largest investment to combat climate change in history. We’re providing $555 BILLION in clean energy investments, which will create hundreds of thousands of good-paying jobs here at home. We're protecting our future generations. That's a #BFD.

1461708626419236864.text: 🚨U.S. House PASSED #BuildBackBetter! It's a historic investment in our "people" infrastructure. Simply put: we're making life easier for hardworking Marylanders. AND, nobody making less than $400,000 will pay a penny more in taxes. To quote @POTUS, this is a #BFD. Here's why:

.@AppropsDems are funding #ForThePeople:
- growing the economy with good-paying American jobs
- improving public health infrastructure

1419657959768997893.text: With all of these initiatives in place, we have a real chance to beat the opioid epidemic and #EndTheAddictionCrisis.

1419657955759296514.text: Finally, we have to make treatment more accessible. More quality, affordable treatment facilities. More funding for research. More access to the medications like methadone and buprenorphine that have been approved to treat opioid use disorder.

1419657951921463300.text: We also need naloxone and other overdose reversal medications readily available in communities around the country. We need people equipped to administer these medications.

1419657948146683914.text: Our number one priority should be prevention. We need to ensure that communities can direct funding to implement policies and programs to prevent people from developing an opioid use disorder in the first place.

1387579502197358594.text: .@POTUS is right. It's long past time we raise the minimum wage. #JointAddress

1250947026193461259.text: It's our responsibility in Congress to provide the much needed relief to those that are suffering. I will continue to do everything in my power to help our businesses, nonprofits, hospitals, health care workers, and first responders endure this unprecedented crisis.

1250946950381387778.text: In addition to this, our front line workers, medical professionals, and state and local governments don’t have the funding or resources they need to stay safe and weather this pandemic. This is unconscionable.

1250946875336937477.text: Now, the SBA’s Paycheck Protection Program (PPP) and Economic Impact Disaster Loans (EIDL) funding has been exhausted, leaving small business owners, employees, and their families in an even more dire situation.

1250946806210494464.text: Then, banks across the country put more barriers up — cutting out whole swaths of businesses that don’t have an existing lending relationship. Those are the orgs that need the help most. It’s just outrageous.

1250946728204869634.text: Our small business and nonprofit community faced roadblock after roadblock as the SBA, Treasury, and the entire Administration failed to provide businesses with consistent and accurate information about how to apply for and receive these loans.

1250946646269181955.text: Throughout the pandemic, I've spoken to countless small business owners from across the 6th district. One thing is clear -- they're nervous and they're angry, and rightfully so.
